bf36de68-f780-4ff9-a2ba-84a448b49b4d:
Choose a {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g} to which you have already applied the Spell Focus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast of this school are very hard to resist.
Benefit: Add +1 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}Difficulty Class{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against spells from the school of magic you select. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks with the bonus from Spell Focus.
Special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new school to which you already have applied the Spell Focus feat.
894db485-7ce9-4293-a3ea-65ffcb6cd90b:
Choose an energy type to which you have already applied the Elemental Focus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast of this energy type are very hard to resist.
Prerequisite: Elemental Focus.
Benefit: Add +1 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}Difficulty Class{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against spells that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the energy type you select. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks with the bonus from Elemental Focus.
